definition: a wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity
details:
noun
- a wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity
= synonyms: debauch, debauchery, saturnalia, riot, bacchanalia, drunken revelry, bacchanal
- secret rite in the cults of ancient Greek or Roman deities involving singing and dancing and drinking and sexual activity
- any act of immoderate indulgence
= example: any act of immoderate indulgence
= synonyms: binge
